
	int main()
	{
		int t, p, q, sum, i, j,n;
		char str[101];

		scanf("%d/n", &t);
		while(t-- > 0)
		{
			sum = 0;
			scanf("%s/n", &str);
			int freq[26]={0};
			for(i = 0; i<strlen(str); i++)
			{
				freq[str[i] - 'a']++;
			}
			scanf("%d/n", &p);
			scanf("%d/n", &q);
			for(i = 0; i< q; i++)
			{
				scanf("%d/n", &n);
				if(n> p*strlen(str))
						printf("-1\n");
                else

				{sum = 0;
				for(j = 0; j< 26; j++)
				{
					sum += p*freq[j];
					if(n<= sum)
						//if( n >= letterIndex[j-1] && n <=letterIndex[j] && letterIndex[j]!=0)
						{
							printf("%c\n",('a' + j));
							break;
						}


				}
				}
			}
		}
	}
